Title: Executive branch's 'decentralized' 'deep state' in charge while voters think president is: Curtis Yarvin
Description: Political blogger Curtis Yarvin, known better by his longtime pseudonym Mencius Moldbug, explained his assessment of the federal Deep State to Fox Nation's Tucker Carlson on Wednesday, explaining that the American people wrongly believe their election of a president puts that individual in control of the executive branch and the country.

Title: 'Techno-Optimism' is Not Something You Should Believe In
Description: Techno-optimism is a dangerous philosophy whose adherents espouse the blind faith that market capitalism and technology will solve the world's problems. In reality, this kind of optimism simply justifies elite power and promotes indifference to human suffering.
